name: Hentai Clicker
description:
Hentai clicker is an relaxing idle game where you get to click and dress your waifu as you please.

Features

• Interactivity whit the girl
• customizable girl
• Secret items.......
• One handed gameplay
• Content updates

Future

What we are planning to add to the game in the future
• More interactivity
• More clothes
• More Upgrades
